The BBC's political editor Nick Robinson said Mr Oliver had no previous political involvement but had been approached by Mr Andy Coulson and had met the prime minister over the weekend. Mr Oliver said: I'm delighted and privileged to be joining David Cameron and his team at such an exciting and challenging time. "My background is broadcasting, but I know that newpapers play a crucial role and I look forward to talking with them.
